parameter.name: obs_input_file_name
parameter.documentation: The name of the input file containing the BUFR code field(s)

parameter.name: obs_level
parameter.documentation: Pressure level to be plotted (upper air only)

parameter.name: obs_level_tolerance
parameter.documentation: Tolerance (hPa) above and below the requested level for which observations may be plotted (applies to OBS_LEVEL only)

parameter.name: obs_type_list
parameter.documentation: A list of observation types (SATEM, TEMP, etc) for which observations are to be plotted
